item.title: If i talk to my npc he give stuff if i log out and i talk again he give again
item.dc:creator: @smkscape smkscape
item.description:
@smkscape wrote:

i made this:

if(vince == 0){ if(NPCID == 243 && System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval) actionInterval = 10000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); addItem(995, 10000000); sendFrame200(4883, 243); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(243).replaceAll("_", " "), 4884); sendFrame126("Here take this 10 million, Enjoy you stay!", 4885); sendFrame126("Click here to continue", 4886); sendFrame75(243, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; vince = 1; saveNeeded = true; savegame(true); savefile =true; } else if (vince == 1) { if(NPCID == 243 && System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval) actionInterval = 10000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); sendFrame200(4883, 243); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(243).replaceAll("_", " "), 4884); sendFrame126("I'm to busy right now!", 4885); sendFrame126("Click here to continue", 4886); sendFrame75(243, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; }

First time i talk he give 10m, if i talk again he says iâ€™m to busy now and he give nothing, but if i log and talk again he give it again.
PLEASE HELP IT MUST BE EASY!
note: i use delta
